## CounterStyleRenderer.renderMarker() method

Render an index into its corresponding marker string. See [CSS Lists Level 3, Text-based Markers](https://www.w3.org/TR/css-lists-3/#text-markers)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
renderMarker(index: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | The counter value to render. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
